alert.note: Alert for Northern Sweet Grass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 20 at 1:10AM MST until November 20 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...West winds gusting up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern Sweet Grass. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...These strong winds could cause trees damage and possible power fluctuations. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber to Harlowton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The potential for damaging winds will weaken around sunrise this morning
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.
